isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: BENDIX TU-FLO 501 - MAINTENANCE - EVERY 200,000 MILES (322,000 KM) OR 24 MONTHS

svcproc.title: EVERY 200,000 MILES (322,000 KM) OR 24 MONTHS

caution.para: In the event it becomes necessary to drain the engine cooling system to prevent damage from freezing, be sure the cylinder head of the compressor is drained also.
